name: CongenitalCytomegalovirusTestsForCMVAntigen
title: Congenital Cytomegalovirus (Tests for CMV Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Cytomegalovirus Antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Cytomegalovirus Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
